subtitle: Clean motion tools for After Effects
title: darkPanel Extension
description:
I know, creating text animation in After Effects for every motion edit is painful... So I stopped that suffering and built my new darkPanel plugin.

Price: “equal to ONE CapCut montage!”

Details: Includes the currently trending Apple Style Text Animation and many more premium animations.

Total text animations: 30

Plugin price: 10$ ✅

You get a full, unlimited version for this price.
